item.title: How to use Sass with Jekyll (Bootstrap and Font Awesome example)
item.description: This post will explain how to use Bootstrap and Font Awesome Sass files in a Jekyll project. Download Sass packages Download the Bootstrap and Font Awosome packages from their original website: Bootstrap Font Awesome Jekyll project The packages contain stylesheets, fonts and javascript files. Therefore, these files have to be placed into your Jekyll project. The files will be placed in a Jekyll project like this one:
